Ploughman's Pub Fundraising Event

Posted by The Stanley Fair on June 28, 2015

Have you enjoyed the entertainment and atmosphere at the Ploughman’s Pub in the Old Dance Hall on Saturday afternoon at the Stanley Fair? Good news! You don’t have to wait until fair time to enjoy the pub again. On Saturday, May 30 from 3:00 to 8:00 come to the Ploughman’s Pub in the Old Dance Hall for good music, good friends, and good fun! - Admission $5.00 - Cash Bar - Snack Food
